panels.title: File descriptors in use and the limit

panels.description: Shows how much bytes of memory is allocated on the Heap for the Objects. Counts all reachable heap objects plus unreachable objects, GC has not yet freed.
panels.title: Heap bytes allocated and still in use

panels.description: Shows how many bytes of idle spans were returned to the OS
panels.title: Heap bytes released to OS

panels.description: How many bytes of memory in total is taken from system by Go.
panels.title: Total number of bytes obtained from system

panels.description: Shows how many objects are allocated on the heap. This changes as GC is performed and new objects are allocated.
panels.title: Number of allocated objects

panels.description: Counts how many pointer dereferences happened
panels.title: Total number of pointer lookups.

panels.description: Shows how many bytes are in in-use spans
panels.title: `In-use` memory spans memory use

panels.description: Shows how many bytes are in idle spans
panels.title: `Idle` memory spans memory use
